name: National Social Society
briefDescription: We initiated in January 2007 as “Lakshya Ek Nai Asha". Now since September 2008, are registered as National Social Society New Delhi India. Our aim is to educate every child, through Motivation for Education. National Social society a non - government development organization is working on issues affecting the education, with a special focus on children & youth believing in 'Every human has right education’ and that is the force for organization’s existence and work. National Social Society is registered Organization at Pan India level and work activity with youth & women, children education lives in community and slums.
